entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: Hello! I’m Francesco and this is my first post on this blog. I choose to create a blog to keep track of my daily adventures about computers, software, Python, information security and a bunch of random tech stuff. Also, to share some useful hacks that I use to do for my job and my hobbies. From time to time, I will write in Italian, my mother language, and I suppose I’ll go a bit off topic, at least in few occasions. Stay tuned!!! ;)
